name: Escapee: Detective Escape
description:
Tomorrow, by wei jia group, the global gem exhibition will be held in a luxury airship, and invited many celebrities and politicians in the city, it is reported that the exhibition will display a priceless treasure, the security system is tight. As a collector of treasures, I naturally can not miss this precious opportunity, the stage is ready, the drama is about to be staged!

Gameplay:
You will play an intelligent and humorous geek. The target is the priceless treasure on the airship. How will you deal with the tight security on the airship? How do you get the treasure under the watchful eyes of the public? And how will you escape? What are you waiting for? Download and start the game!

The game features
Humanized portrait operation: the game adopts portrait operation mode, players can complete the whole process of the game with one hand operation.
Challenging levels: each level of the game carefully designed, increasing the difficulty coefficient, a variety of interesting puzzles.
Rich and interesting characters: there are many characters in the game with distinct personalities. Each character has different dialogues and interactive puzzles.
